page.title: 06Playground games. (1)
page.content: {Run Rabs or Tig} :- The object of the game is to tig the people who are not on. One person is on and stands in the middle of the playground. The other players stand at one end of the playground. Everyone runs to the other side of the playground while he has to tig (touch) them. Anybody tug is on as well. The game goes on until all are tug. The first to be tug is on next game. {Chain Tig} :- This is just like normal tig except that when you get tug you have to hold hands. {Chain in the mud} :- This is a variation of chain tig. When a person has been tug he stands with his arms straight out until someone goes under his arms. Then he is free. When he has been tug three times he is also on.
